title: Looking for OCE clash team!
body: Im sadly silvir 2 atm from some recent bad game. Im a adc main, Ive got tier 4 master up on all most all adc's. Im 18 and live in WA looking for a team with good people to get along with thanks :)

replies.body: Support main here, add me if you need a support or sub.

Gold  ADC main here, ok with MID, TOP, JG and SUP
Game ID: FW betty
Hey man, We're looking for a botlane and keen for you to join, we're all around 21, we meme pretty hard and want to win obviously, add me and we can play :)
